nodes.text: Shrike was an EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate which served in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. The frigate was attacked and destroyed by three B-wing starfighters, one of them piloted by Keyan Farlander, and four RZ-1 A-wing interceptors. After the Shrike's destruction, a pair of CR90 corvettes, designated Banshee, and a number of Alpha-class Xg-1 Star Wings arrived at the same location, only to be destroyed by the same strike force.
